info.name: E-commerce
info.description:
# Introduction
What does your API do?

# Overview
Things that the developers should know about

# Authentication
What is the preferred way of using the API?

# Error Codes
What errors and status codes can a user expect?

# Rate limit
Is there a limit to the number of requests an user can send?

request.description: Verify emial with the link sent to the register email address. If not Verified users won't be allow to login.

Admin only. Use admin token
A category must be created before any product should be added
Admin only. Use the Admin token.

Admin only. Use the Admin token.
Add products under the existing category. The product name should be unique

response.name: Add product

request.description:
Admin only. Use the Admin token. 
Update product with product id. 
The product can only be updated when no order has been placed.
Get all product under a specific category

response.name: Get all Product
response.body:
{

item.name: Get all product order by category

response.name: Get all product order by category

request.description:
Admin only. Use the Admin token.
The category should only be deleted if no Product has been added.

Admin only. Use the Admin token.
The product should only be deleted when it has been ordered.
order product. product_name must be an already existing product

response.name: Order product
response.body:

request.description:
Order can only be cancel when order status is pending. 
The user who create order can cancel the order.
Order payment using paystack. Pass order is as params.
